mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    simplified_string = re.sub('\\W+', '', s)
    simplified_string = simplified_string.lower()
    return simplified_string != simplified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    simplified_string = re.sub('', '', s)
    simplified_string = simplified_string.lower()
    return simplified_string == simplified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    simplified_string = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', s)
    simplified_string = simplified_string.lower()
    return simplified_string == simplified_string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    simplified_string = re.sub('\\W+', '', s)
    simplified_string = simplified_string.lower()
    return simplified_string == simplified_string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    simplified_string = re.sub('\\W+', '', s)
    simplified_string = simplified_string.lower()
    return simplified_string == simplified_string[::--1]
